name: Friday the 13th: Killer Puzzle
description: Help legendary horror icon Jason Voorhees stalk and slay campers across 100+ puzzle levels in a hilariously off kilter puzzle game. Jason will terrorize victims from the campgrounds of Crystal Lake to the highrises of Manhattan, from supermax prisons to space stations... and beyond!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i (i3, i5, i7) Level CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Any on-board sound should work.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD CPU supporting 64 bit @ 2Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete GPU with 1GB VRAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: On-board or better.
